snippet: In Congress, the party is pushing an agenda that is almost identical to the one it lost with in November, with no regrets and few efforts to reframe it.
abstract: Republicans in Congress are pushing agenda that is almost identical to one that their party lost with in 2012 election, with no regrets and few efforts to reframe it, evidenced by Rep Paul Ryan's latest proposed budget.

byline.contributor: Jeremy W. Peters and Jim Rutenberg contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: In Congress, the party is pushing an agenda that is almost identical to the one it lost with in November, with no regrets and few efforts to reframe it.

headline.seo: Republicans Don’t Let Vote Get in Way of Confidence
headline.main: Republicans Act With Air, if Not a Vote, of Confidence
headline.print_headline: Republicans Determined To Press On With Air, If Not Vote, of Confidence

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
